newsitem.title: USA: Caterpillar gets $12.3 mln Nicaragua pact.
newsitem.headline: Caterpillar gets $12.3 mln Nicaragua pact.

text.p: Caterpillar Inc said Monday it will supply nine heavy fuel oil generator sets for use in a power plant at Puerto Sandino, Nicaragua.
It valued the order at $12.3 million.
Caterpillar said the nine Model 3616 generator sets will produce 36,000 total kilowatts of energy at the Puerto Sandino power plant, which will become operational in early 1997.
Caterpillar said the nine generator sets were built in its large engine center in Lafayette, Ind.
The company said it won the contract from Far East Livingston Shipbuilding of Singapore.
